references.paper_title: Short term spectral analysis, synthesis, and modification by discrete Fourier transform
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the short-time Fourier transform, a key technique used in the paper's time-series-to-image transformation.
This paper introduces Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks, a crucial recurrent neural network architecture frequently used in time-series analysis, which the authors address and improve upon.
This work introduced the Transformer architecture, a highly influential model for processing sequential data that the authors contrast their approach against.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper is foundational for score-based generative models, the core methodology behind the diffusion models that the authors utilize in their approach.
This paper is a seminal work on denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which are essential to the diffusion models used in the authors' proposed generative model.
